recipesJson.name: Bangin Bourbon Bread
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description:
A delicious banana nut bread with a hint of bourbon. Winner of DIYorDIE Recipe of the Year 2015.

reviews.text: Finally got around to mixing this.  Couldn't wait to let it steep and have already vaped 30ml of it in a day.  I will be mixing 120ml of it so that I have no choice but to let it sit, but it's already amazing as a shake-n-vape!
Awesome recipe. No need to describe why, everyone already has.  Definitely better after a good steep. Good job Skiddlz

One of the most authentic recipes I've ever tried, this shit is spot-fucking-on! Delicious, warm, fresh banana bread with healthy sprinkling of nuts. Definitely gets better with age, it's amazing at a week but fucking orgasmic at a month.
This recipe is amazing.  I let it steep for 7-10 days before using it.  So damn good
